name: Essence (itch) (WoxelGames)
description:
29th GM48 (Ranked 28/82) Theme: Colors are Important

This game was an entry for the 29th GM48. 

View original submission here: https://gm48.net/game/1123/essence

The Jam Version of the game is the exact same as the one on the gm48 page.

Story

The Blue Essence Orb was stolen! The Red Ones are behind it. collect Essence and become stronger!

Controls WASD   Moving Space JumpE InteractJKLAttacksALT + EnterToggle Fullscreen Credits Programming WinuX Graphics SwissPick Audio WinuX Level Design & StorySwissPick
